    @BaseClass
public class WaspWaistCFItemBased
extends WaspWaistCF
implements net.hudup.core.alg.DuplicatableAlg
    This abstract class implements the item-based Wasp Waist (WW) collaborative filtering algorithm.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • pip

        protected double pip(net.hudup.core.data.RatingVector vRating1,
                     net.hudup.core.data.RatingVector vRating2,
                     net.hudup.core.data.Profile profile1,
                     net.hudup.core.data.Profile profile2)
        Description copied from class: NeighborCFExt
        Calculating the PIP measure between two pairs. PIP measure is developed by Hyung Jun Ahn, and implemented by Loc Nguyen. The first pair includes the first rating vector and the first profile. The second pair includes the second rating vector and the second profile.
        Specified by:
        pip in class NeighborCFExt
        Parameters:
        vRating1 - first rating vector.
        vRating2 - second rating vector.
        profile1 - first profile.
        profile2 - second profile.
        Returns:
        NHSM measure between both two rating vectors and profiles.

      • pss

        protected double pss(net.hudup.core.data.RatingVector vRating1,
                     net.hudup.core.data.RatingVector vRating2,
                     net.hudup.core.data.Profile profile1,
                     net.hudup.core.data.Profile profile2)
        Description copied from class: NeighborCFExt
        Calculating the PSS measure between two pairs. PSS measure is developed by Haifeng Liu, Zheng Hu, Ahmad Mian, Hui Tian, Xuzhen Zhu, and implemented by Loc Nguyen. The first pair includes the first rating vector and the first profile. The second pair includes the second rating vector and the second profile.
        Specified by:
        pss in class NeighborCFExt
        Parameters:
        vRating1 - first rating vector.
        vRating2 - second rating vector.
        profile1 - first profile.
        profile2 - second profile.
        Returns:
        PSS measure between both two rating vectors and profiles.

      • pc

        protected double pc(net.hudup.core.data.RatingVector vRating1,
                    net.hudup.core.data.RatingVector vRating2,
                    net.hudup.core.data.Profile profile1,
                    net.hudup.core.data.Profile profile2,
                    int fixedColumnId)
        Description copied from class: NeighborCFExt
        Calculating the PC measure between two rating vectors. PC measure is developed by Keunho Choi and Yongmoo Suh. It implemented by Loc Nguyen. The first pair includes the first rating vector and the first profile. The second pair includes the second rating vector and the second profile.
        Specified by:
        pc in class NeighborCFExt
        Parameters:
        vRating1 - first rating vector.
        vRating2 - second rating vector.
        profile1 - first profile.
        profile2 - second profile.
        fixedColumnId - fixed column identifier.
        Returns:
        PC measure between both two rating vectors and profiles.
